name: Roots of all Evil
description:
This is a short top-down shooter game idea, made for the Weekly Game Jam: 166, with the theme of: Roots.

Controls:

-Movement : WASD

-Shoot: Left-click / Space

-Switch weapons: C / MMB

I intended to build this for WebGL, but couldn't get it to work. Also didn't get around to adding a pause menu, so apologies for that.
